purpose: Facilitates the creation and coordination of multi-agent systems for complex problem-solving tasks
principle: Built on the Arklex framework, leveraging Python's capabilities for agent orchestration and coordination
reusability: Offers modular components and APIs for easy integration into existing systems, supports plug-and-play agent modules
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and community support, experimental features subject to change
name: Agent-First-Organization
description: The official Python library for Arklex framework
highlight: Python library for building and orchestrating multi-agent systems using the Arklex framework
